WorkItem.ClosedComment: If you can't follow the posting guidelines, don't post.
WorkItem.Description: Please either make this work as intended or remove the functionality until it can be made to work as intended because as it stands now all it is doing is confusing people and making more work for those of us associated with EnhSim.

Comments.Message: Thanks any way Rouncer.  Have responded on Elitist Jerks, in the Rawr.Enhance thread.  Will fix this (and the other problems) when I actually have some time.  May be able to this weekend if nothing comes up.
